Text:
Schon55, thanks a lot for uploading yet another great classic from HH. I have not heard this album in years. Listening to HH with just bass and percussion backing him up is pure joy!

Do you happen to have Hancock's "My Point of View" album by any chance? If so, could you upload it please?
You are still the best jazz uploader on TPB. Thanks you again for all the great music you provide.
